ygData.subject: RE: ebay
ygData.msgSnippet: I was being sarcastic, you know me=) and, if you turn into another Radigan or Solos, selling EQ on ebay, Ill quit Everquest;) (sarcastic again) ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
I was being sarcastic, you know me=)

and, if you turn into another Radigan or Solos, selling EQ on ebay, Ill quit
Everquest;)
(sarcastic again)

-----Original Message-----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
[mailto:Michael.Garramone@...]
Sent: Thursday, January 06, 2000 7:25 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] ebay


buy? i was seeing what i could sell =P
j/k i was just curious and bored. and i told you if nagafen would drop me a
frickin drum already (/bonk Maravana) you'd have a mm drum.

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L35 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server


> oooh buy me something, oh most wise and powerful Bard mistress Shada!
> (kneels)
>
> Martyn
